name: Fairy Llama Goes to Space
description:
A game made for the 🎆Amaze Me Game Jam🎆

Cool Story:

Fairy Llama Goes to Space

He's had it with the Human Race

Time to go home, where they actually care

...for their precious planet, although it's shaped like a pear

👍

Features:

⭐ Fairy Llama main character (have you ever even seen one before?)

⭐ Neon cube-thingies, guaranteed to bleed your eyes out of their sockets!

⭐ Nausea and seizure inducing gameplay. Cheaper than a roller coaster ride (unless you have an uncle who owns a theme park)!

⭐ 20 Waves (levels that is, not those moving water-things)

⭐ Hyper cool pixel glitters everywhere!

⭐ Original soundtrack made only a few hours before the deadline !

⭐ Very cool 'no time left to make an ending'-feature, which makes you feel ripped off when you've made it till the end!

How to play:

Use the arrow keys on keyboard or game pad direction buttons to move around.

Try to fly through every cube and make it to the end of every wave!

Team:

Bimbarlade : EVERYTHING
